articles.author: Tommaso Lecca
articles.title: European airlines go ballistic over French air traffic controller strike - politico.eu
articles.description: Ryanair boss denounced Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen as a “useless politician” for not acting to protect flights.
articles.content: This week's walkout was called by France's second-largest air traffic controllers' union, UNSA-ICNA; it was joined by the USAC-CGT, the third-largest union. According to AFP, some 270 controllers out… [+1020 chars]
